column1: Kata Robata////Super experience! While in Houston a friend and I were in the mood for sushi. We looked up the rating on Yelp and decided to try it
column2: what a find. We went without reservation on a Saturday night and there was a 20 min wait so we decided to sit at the bar. The servers were amazing! The menu is pretty extensive and complex
column3: the servers were very knowledgable and helpful in pointing different items on the menus. The sushi was excellent
column4: but the standouts for me where the Pork Belly and Papaya Salad
column6: Miso Gyoza (pork potstickers ) and Uni Chaawanmushi .
